Text: I despise the fact that sometimes TPB freaks out about some characters in title/description. The funny thing is I swore i erased the apostrophe in the title.. ARGH!!!
:D  still appreciate the up, even if tpb has substituted the apostrophe! thanks MrD :)

Apostrophes, hyphens that are separated by spaces, ellipses.  I'm sure there are more.  They've ruined many of my description boxes.
Well in this torrent specifically I thought i had gotten rid of the apostrophe in Furys, what annoys me is sometimes it fine to use, : - ' other times TPB loses its mind
